_How JavaScript is used in WebTycoon_

= JavaScript in Webtycoon =

This page shows how JavaScript is used in the WebTycoon Framework. WebTycoon uses JSON and AJAX to interact with the server and make the game a little bit more dektoplike than other webgames where you have to reload the pages over and over.

= Details =

*The standart JSON Request to the server contains:*
  * The class to use
  * The function to call in the class
  * The parameters for the function
  * A timestamp to recogize the answers


*The standart JSON answer to the client can contain:*
  * The timestamp given in the request (this is necessary)
  * The money the player has
  * The map to display
  * A message for the statusbar
  * A window to popup
